mapper.select: SELECT city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', city_info_langitude as 'cityInfoLangitude', city_info_latitude as 'cityInfoLatitude', city_info_summary as 'cityInfoSummary', city_info_image as 'cityInfoImage' FROM city_info WHERE city_info_do_name = #{city_info_do_name};
